title: Reinforcement Learning-Based Adaptive Flocking Behavior Simulation Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational machine learning, swarm intelligence concepts, and reinforcement learning algorithms
context.additional_context: Focuses on solving swarm behavior optimization problems using lightweight VR simulations based on smartphones. Learners experiment with swarm formation and path optimization based on environmental feedback

learning_goals: It can model adaptive changes in collective behavior based on environmental reward signals
It designs cooperative strategies among individuals within a group by applying the TD-learning algorithm
It can quantitatively evaluate the search efficiency of a group in a simulated environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
